Hello,
I'm Jihyun

I'm a front-end developer focused on building interfaces and experiences with purpose and intention

About

I transitioned into front-end development with immense gratitude to the supportive developer communities and instructors that guided my journey. Prior to this, I worked in digital marketing. After careful consideration, I decided to pursue what energizes me the most—building things.

This passion for creation traces back to my childhood when, at the age of 9, I spent hours crafting a miniature house with wooden chopsticks. Today, I find myself immersed for hours in the process of developing and designing for the web, even when faced with challenges.

My key strength lies in working with clear intention and excelling at seeing and tracking small details to ensure a seamless user experience. I feel motivated by turning intangible ideas into real-life outcomes, leveraging my skills and knowledge to bring joy and positive impacts on everyday life.
